original_title: มาเฟียพันธ์ุมังกร
overview: A love story in the midst of Chinese expatriates’ gangsters (Ang Yi-secret society) war in Siam, 1889. A bloody historical Chinese gangster fight for power in the heart of Siam capital city, led to the establishment of the first Police Department in Thailand for a massive crackdown.
title: China Town
